metadata.name: The Last Stand
metadata.description:
"Year 20XX,

Mekabae #158, SHOJO class, witnessed the invasion and destruction of the city due to a sudden alien attack, her squadron was deployed to the battlefield to push back the invaders but, by a sad twist of fate, they were defeated and she was the only survivor...
Despair was starting to seep through her mind but she quickly remembered her duty and despite her grief, she was determined to fight to the bitter end. Her heroic battle was recorded and preserved. "


"-You won't get away with this! "
-Mekabae #158 


Looped Animation based on "Season 2 Mekabae" from BaeCaf√©. 
I added audio to it to convey the mood better.


4k  2160x2160  24fps
